00008 Example::Example()
00009 {
00010         m_gui.setupUi(this);
00011         m_twitLib = new QTwitLib(this);
00012         MakeConnections();
00013         
00014         m_gui.pushButton->setText("Public Timeline");

00026 void Example::MakeConnections()
00027 {
00028         connect(m_gui.pushButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(Button1Event()));
00029         connect(m_gui.pushButton_2, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(Button2Event()));
00030         connect(m_gui.pushButton_3, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(Button3Event()));
00031         connect(m_gui.pushButton_4, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(Button4Event()));       
00032 }

00035 {
00036         return m_gui.lineEdit->text();

00039 QString Example::GetPassword()
00040 {
00041         return m_gui.lineEdit_2->text();
00042 }

00046 // Display public timeline
00047 void Example::Button1Event()
00048 {
00049         m_twitLib->GetPublicTimeline();
00050 }
00051 //=====================================================================
00052 // Login with supplied username / password
00053 void Example::Button2Event()
00054 {       
00055         m_twitLib->Login(GetUsername().toStdString(),GetPassword().toStdString());
00056 }
00057 //=====================================================================
00058 // testing all
00059 void Example::Button3Event()
00060 {       
00061         m_twitLib->VerifyCredentials();
00062 }
00063 //=====================================================================
00064 // Clear Text area
00065 void Example::Button4Event()
00066 {       
00067         m_gui.plainTextEdit->setPlainText("");
00068         m_twitLib->Logout();
00069 }
